description:
Change of use from B2 to D1 and the erection of a 3rd floor roof extension to form 233 sq.mts of B1 use 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  A000, 001, 002, 003, 004, 005, A101,                         102, 103, 104 and A112
decision_conditions: The proposal, by reason of its scale, bulk and design is considered to relate unsatisfactorily with the host building and fails to respect the built form of the surrounding streetscape, resulting in a dominant, discordant and obtrusive feature in the streetscene and the locality generally contrary to Policies Env1, D1, D2A and D9 of the Islington Council's Unitary Development Plan, First Review, Revised Plan, Second Deposit Version 2000.
